name: Frog Falls
description:
Frog Falls

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 104.

Aim with your mouse, and click to jump! Try and make it up the waterfall in a set amount of jumps before the froggy gets tired.  Beware of obstacles getting in your way! Hopefully you only rage a little :)

You can support our amazing composer and check out the soundtrack here!

https://mmsound.bandcamp.com/album/frog-falls-original-soundtrack
